duties_responsibilities.duty: Research and manage relationships with hospitals and clinical agency sites for nursing students to complete clinical rotations.
Provide oversight for clinical affiliation agreements by attaining contract signatures.
Manage relationships with existing clinical agency partners to ensure successful clinical experiences for nursing students.
Serve as the first point-of-contact for clinical faculty, students, and clinical partners regarding clinical experiences.
Coordinate and attend healthcare-related events at the direction of campus and national leaders.
Maintain partnerships with healthcare facility educators and leadership to ensure a strong working relationship.
Monitor and manage compliance and partner-specific requirements.
Complete other duties as assigned and comply with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree preferred, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
